pageContext.claim: “Well, that I don't know [whether the Trump golf club in Bedminster, N.J., employs undocumented immigrants] because I don't run it. But I would say this: Probably every club in the United States has that because it seems to be, from what I understand, a way that people did business. But we've ended -- whatever they did, we have a very strict rule that -- those rules are very strict.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has employed undocumented immigrants for years at his properties, and his company, now run by his sons, continues to do so, according to reports in The Washington Post.
